string.text: LOCKED-UP CASE
Reach the digger base
I have the safe code, and now I just have to get to the base. Better not get caught!
Talk to the digger leader
I gotta trick the clan and convince them that I come with good intentions. Time to improvize.
Exit the area
Seems I was able to convince that weirdo. Now I wait and see what happens next.
Open the safe
I need to open the case, grab the documents and scram out of here.
Grab the documents from the safe
The safe is open. Time to grab the loot.
RIFLES
Retrieve your weapons
I need to retrieve the weapons that I handed in before entering the digger base.
Report to Shooter
I have the case. Time to report to the contractor.
Hand over the case to Crutch
Hand over the case to the trader. I hope this will smooth out our relations.
WAR OF THE CASE
Acquire the case by force
I was unable to get the case peacefully. I'll have to get a hold of it by force, or else I won't earn the trader's trust.
SAFE CODE
Kill the digger leader
The easy way didn't work - I'll have to do this by sheer force. The code is likely held by the leader.
DISTRESS SIGNAL
Respond to the stalker's distress signal
A stalker named Red sent an SOS signal. I'll go check the entrance to the Agroprom underground.
Help Red rescue his friend
Red needs help with rescuing his friend from an anomaly. We'll see what happens...
Follow Red
I need to follow Red to where his comrade was left to wait for help.
Talk to Red
Looks like we arrived, but all I can see are corpses...
DANGEROUS MISSIONS
Meet Perch in the Bar
A stalker named Perch offered me a good sum to partner up for Barkeep's work. If I find myself in the Bar, I'll check it out.
HUNGRY SENTRY
Get food for the soldier
A soldier in the vicinity of the scientist base has asked for food. Only then will he call over Dubinin. Four bread loafs, cans of meat or sausages should be enough.
Give the soldier food
I hope the army guy will talk to Dubinin about meeting me now.
DRUNKEN MEDIC
Find Alexander
The stalker camp is in dire need of a medic. The most reliable option would be bringing a former research assistant to their base, but first he needs to be found... and laid off the bottle.
SCIENTIFIC WORK
Talk to Dubinin
Head's throbbing... but I should get up and go meet with Dubinin. He wants to talk to me regarding Gamzat's notes.
Talk to Dubinin's assistant

I signed up to contribute to the scientist effort by studying artifact transmutation. I was given a pass and paid quite handsomely. Doesn't seem like a tough job, and my instructions are crystal clear - better to rummage in anomalies than run from mutants and sneak off bandit boxes.
Go to the anomalous swamp
I need to extract a transmuted artifact from the anomalous swamp. Karavayev will provide assistance.
Kill the stalkers
We encountered some stalkers seeking to get their hands the transmutational artifact. They aren't willing to part with it so easily...
Talk to Karavayev
I need to talk to Karavayev and discuss our next steps.
Wait until Karavayev finds a safe path
Karavayev will attempt to find a safe way to the artifact. Let's see how that turns out.
Talk to Karavayev
It seems my companion's search didn't go as planned...
Get the artifact
Time to do things the good old fashioned way: no equipment. I'll have to find a safe path to the artifact and get it.
Talk to Karavayev
I got the artifact. Now I can return to the scientist facility.
Return to Dubinin
Time to return to the scientist facility and talk to Dubinin about the artifact I acquired.
NEW SURROUNDINGS
Talk to Yurok about the road to Novoshepelychi
I saw a long road to places not yet discovered! I'll go through the Cordon and see an old acquaintance of mine. I should to talk to Yurok about the safest way to get to Novoshepelychi.
Go to Novoshepelychi
It's time to familiarize myself with new surroundings. Yurok told me that Novoshepelychi is an even more dangerous place than the Garbage. I'll keep that in mind.
ESCORT
Cover the scientists on the way to the facility
I must cover the scientists while they carry out their scientific work.
COMMANDER'S CALL
Talk to the colonel
Colonel Klinskikh called me to see him. I hope he's got more important work for me than strolling with the scientists.
BEFORE THE DEPARTURE
Talk to the squad

My squad was at last trusted with a serious operation. Its outcome will decide everything: either I keep protecting the scientist chambers until the contract expires or I keep advancing to the center of the Zone. I need to prepare for the departure and exchange a few words with my squadmates.
Talk to Koval

Before commencing the operation, I need to get to know more about Koval. He's a strange one, rarely speaking to other milstalkers, keeping to himself and disappearing from the facility. So why does the colonel tolerate all that and even insist on sending him off with our team? His signal is coming from the edges of Agroprom. I'll go check it out.
Rest until morning

The squad is ready to launch the operation. For now, though, I should get some rest and build up my strength. Yantar's always given me strange and sullen feelings - it's always felt damp, hopeless... and ridden with death, even while the mobile bunker was in operation and while stalkers flocked to sign up for work and go artifact hunting. But what about now? There have been all kinds of legends about the lake for a month now. Stalkers stay as far away from it as possible, the scientists haven't made contact with anyone and the anomalies have become increasingly active. What did Sakharov research? Are they still alive? We'll have our answers tomorrow.
RISE AND SHINE
Talk to Hottab

After reporting the mission's success to the colonel, we decided to celebrate our return from such hazardous areas. We had a good time. The boys are still sleeping, except Hottabych. I'll go have a talk with him.
Head to the bathroom
I need to freshen up before seeing the colonel.
FACE-TO-FACE
Go to the colonel's office
The colonel wanted to see me this morning. I should check what he wants.
MISSING SCIENTIST
Have a word with the group

The colonel set the objective of finding a missing scientist named Dubinin. I'll be searching for him on my own in order not to draw any attention. Beforehand, I need to inform my group about this mission so that they can render assistance should the need arise.
Have a word with the military stalkers
The military stalkers might know more about how the scientist disappeared, having previously acted as an escort for him during fieldwork. I should question them.
Examine the tunnel at Agroprom
According to the stalkers, a scientist landed in an anomaly in a tunnel at Agroprom. It could be Dubinin. I should examine that area and confirm my suspicions.
Take the remains to an expert
Human remains and scraps of Dubinin's signature scientist suit were located by the anomaly. To confirm that it's really him, I should take the genetic material to the scientist facility.
Go to the Cordon
A scientific expedition is preparing to fly to Dityatki. Perhaps they'll bring me on board so I don't have to trudge to Sidorovich on foot.
Find clues behind Dubinin's disappearance
For all intents and purposes, I've been given free rein on the operation. I must find all possible clues to find out what happened to professor Dubinin.
DOG ATTACK
Help the field group fight off the attack
These mutant attacks on assistants in the field are nothing out of the ordinary. I should help my colleagues protect the scientists.
Talk to Kridov
Before leaving, I'll have another word with Kridov.
